Segmented controls

Used instead of radio buttons when there are a limited number of mutually-exclusive choices.

To illustrate the styling of checked and hover states, .hover and .checked classes have been added to simulate these states. These classes are not required in production where the :hover and :checked pseudo-classes are used.
